sentences.english: Give Timely Help and Do a Good Deed Everyday. I Donate Confidently.
sentences.chinese: 雪中送炭，日行一善，捐赠对象我识拣。

sentences.english: Name three friends who helped you through a difficult time.
sentences.chinese: 说出三位曾为你雪中送炭的朋友的名字。

sentences.english: Many believe a true friend does not abandon in the time of need.
sentences.chinese: 很多人认为一个真正的朋友只会雪中送炭。
